subject: Suits and Litigation
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Isiah Thomas spent four hours Monday at his sexual-harassment trial across from his accuser, Anucha Browne Sanders, listening as a pool of potential jurors was winnowed to 14.
snippet: Isiah Thomas spent four hours Monday at his sexual-harassment trial across from his accuser, Anucha Browne Sanders, listening as a pool of potential jurors was winnowed to 14.
